title: Ajax hires Liverpool assistant John Heitinga as new head coach | AP News
snippet: Ajax has hired John Heitinga as head coach to replace Francesco Farioli nearly two weeks after the Italian resigned following the team’s late-season collapse.

title: r/soccer on Reddit: [VI] Fred Grim will be Ajax first team head coach until at least the winter break

title: Ajax appoint Heitinga as new coach | Reuters
snippet: Ajax Amsterdam have named John Heitinga as their new coach, with the former Netherlands defender signing a two-year deal, the Eredivisie club confirmed on Saturday.
